comment: Test are hard with no material given to study. Do not take!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: I am usually an A student but he was extremely harsh grader. Little content to go off of and assignments were vague. Test were also extremely hard.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: Professor Lebedev only grades you on a few things. NO test but weekly quizzes and discussions. Easy to communicate with and cares about his students. As long as you do the quizzes and take the group project seriously which is a bit time consuming but not super difficult then you will pass no problem.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Group projects--Graded by few things
